QuestData.Title: Xuk It!
QuestData.Description: It is done.$b$bWith this enchantment, not only can you roam amongst the goren freely, but you can move as they do.$b$bYour travels through Gorgrond are now made simple. You have safe access to places otherwise impossible to reach.$b$bXuk's ancestors have made it so.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the goren disguise to explore locations in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good that you still have your wits about you. You do... have your wits about you?

Objectives.Objective: See where the first tunnel leads
See where the second tunnel leads
See where the third tunnel leads
Take the tunnel back to Breaker's Crown
